title: Job Vacancies at First Cardiology Consultants (FCC)
content:
First Cardiology Consultants (FCC) is a company created with a vision to be the avant-garde providers of cardiology and cardiovascular services of the highest quality in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Human Resources Assistant 

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time (On-site)

Role Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Human Resources Assistant will support day-to-day HR functions, including assisting with HR management, maintaining HR information systems (HRIS), administering benefits, and coordinating training programs.
	The role may also involve tasks such as employee onboarding, record-keeping, and ensuring compliance with HR policies and procedures.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field
	Proficiency in Human Resources (HR) and HR Management
	Experience with Human Resources Information Systems (HRIS)
	Knowledge of Benefits Administration
	Skills in coordinating and delivering Training programs
	Knowlege of Nigeria labour law act.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment
	Previous experience in the healthcare industry is a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: hr@firstcardiology.org using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.)  Pharmacy Technician

Job Locations: Lagos Island, Lagos
Job Title: Full-Time (On-site)

Role Description


	This is a full-time on-site role for a Pharmacy Technician located in Lagos Island.
	The Pharmacy Technician will be responsible for managing prescriptions, assisting pharmacists with daily tasks, ensuring proper inventory control, and providing excellent customer service.
	Day-to-day tasks include preparing medications, labeling and organizing drug inventory, and addressing patient inquiries and needs.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Certified Pharmacy Technician or relevant qualification preferred
	2-3 years of experince and Licensed to practice
	Prescription management and Pharmacy Technician skills
	Strong Inventory Control abilities
	Excellent Customer Service skills
	Attention to detail and organizational skills
	Ability to work collaboratively in a healthcare team
	Experience in a healthcare setting is a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: hr@firstcardiology.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Medical Officer

Job Locations: Lagos
Job Title: Full-Time

Job Description


	Job openings for a Medical Officer with an outstanding medical knowledge and excellent counseling skills.
	The Job holder may refer to a specialist/consultant when they need further diagnosis or treatment 


Responsibilities


	Respond to patient’s medical problems by referring to their history.
	Participate in all treatment and preventative health care services as delegated and agreed upon the supervising medical Director 
	Maintaining accurate documentation using EMR
	Interview Patients , take medical histories, perform physical examination, analyze,diagnose, and explain medical problems during consultation, interpret results under the supervision of the medical Director and referral, where necessary.
	Maintaining confidentiality and impartiality at all times.
	Explaining procedures or prescribed treatment to patients 
	Liaising with other medical professionals in the hospital.
	Formulate and diagnosed treatment plans, in consultation with or referring to supervising Doctors as appropriate.
	Give clinical instruction to other clinical teams as required.


Requirements


	Degree in Medicine from an accredited University.
	Candidate should posses an MBSS qualification with 13 years of experience 
	Compulsory completion of Nysc
	The candidate should have Uptodate registration and license to practice medicine from the MDCN(Nigerian Medical and Dental Council Associations)
	Knowledge of general medicine
	Computer literacy 
	Excellent communication skills 
	Fantastic counseling and listening skills 
	Good organizational and time management skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: hr@firstcardiology.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Vacancies at Team Manager
content:
Team Manager is a modern productivity platform designed to help teams stay organized, collaborate effectively, and achieve more in less time. We empower businesses of all sizes to manage projects, track tasks, and streamline communication — all in one intuitive workspace.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Django Developer

Job Location: Utako, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an experienced Django Developer to join our dynamic team in Abuja. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in backend development, API design, and database management.
	You will work closely with the frontend and product teams to build scalable, high-performance applications for enterprise and SaaS platforms.


Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend applications using Django and Django REST Framework.
	Integrate APIs and third-party services.
	Optimize application performance and ensure security best practices.
	Collaborate with frontend developers to deliver seamless user experiences.
	Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.


Eligibility


	Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
	At least 3 years of proven experience working as a Django Developer.
	Experience working in Agile teams is an added advantage.


Skills:


	Strong proficiency in Python and Django/Django REST Framework.
	Experience with PostgreSQL/MySQL and database optimization.
	Knowledge of authentication/authorization mechanisms.
	Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
	Understanding of version control tools (Git/GitHub/GitLab).


Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Frontend Developer

Job Location: Utako, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer with at least 3 years of professional experience. The successful candidate will be responsible for building responsive and visually appealing user interfaces that deliver excellent user experiences.
	You will work alongside backend developers, UI/UX designers, and product managers to bring digital products to life.


Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain responsive web applications using modern frontend frameworks.
	Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX mockups with precision.
	Ensure cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
	Optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability.
	Work closely with backend developers to integrate APIs and services.


Eligibility


	Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
	At least 3 years of hands-on experience as a Frontend Developer.
	Experience working in collaborative Agile teams is an advantage.


Skills:


	Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+).
	Experience in UI/UX design and development.
	Strong experience in Django templates
	Knowledge of state management tools (Redux, Vuex, etc.).
	Familiarity with REST APIs and frontend-backend integration.
	Understanding of version control tools (Git/GitHub/GitLab).
	Knowledge of responsive and adaptive design principles.


Click here to apply online

 

 

3.) Executive Assistant to the CEO

Job Location: Utako, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Calendar and Time Management: Manage the CEO's complex and ever-changing calendar, scheduling internal and external meetings, appointments, and deadlines, and proactively resolving scheduling conflicts.
	Correspondence and Communication: Act as a gatekeeper and liaison, managing the CEO's incoming and outgoing communications (phone calls, emails, mail), drafting and editing professional correspondence, reports, and presentations.
	Travel Coordination: Arrange and manage all aspects of domestic and international travel, including flights, accommodation, detailed itineraries, and ground transportation.
	Meeting Support: Prepare meeting agendas, gather necessary materials, take comprehensive meeting minutes, and track follow-up action items to ensure timely completion.
	Administrative and Project Support: Manage expense reports, process invoices, conduct research, and provide support for special projects and initiatives as needed.
	Confidentiality and Discretion: Handle sensitive information and maintain the highest level of confidentiality in all interactions and tasks.
	Office and External Liaison: Serve as the primary point of contact for internal staff, clients, board members, and external stakeholders, representing the executive office with professionalism.


Skills:


	Proven experience (typically 3+ years) as an Executive Assistant, supporting C-Level executives or senior leadership.
	Exceptional organizational skills and a meticulous attention to detail.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to interact confidently with all levels of staff and external partners.
	Expert proficiency in the Microsoft Office Suite (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and/or Google Workspace.
	Demonstrated ability to be proactive, anticipate needs, and solve problems independently.
	Proven ability to manage multiple priorities and projects simultaneously in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
	High level of integrity and professional discretion.
	A college degree is preferred, but equivalent relevant experience will be considered.


Eligibility:


	Must be a graduate with strong computer skills.


Salary Range
N70,000.00 - N150,000.00 per month. 

Click here to apply online    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Manager",
  "description": "Blaque Swann Legal Practitioners is a dynamic law firm committed to delivering practical,innovative, and client-focused legal solutions. With a strong emphasis on integrity,professionalism, and excellence, the firm provides legal advisory and representation across diverse practice areas including corporate and commercial law, dispute resolution, real estate,intellectual property, regulatory compliance, and personal legal services.

Blaque Swann Pop Up (BSPU) is a contemporary fashion and lifestyle brand that celebrates creativity, style, and individuality. Established as a fashion store and experiential retail showroom, BSPU curates a unique blend of clothing, accessories, and statement pieces that reflect modern trends while staying true to timeless elegance.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Content Creation &amp; Editing:


	Create engaging short-form videos, reels, and stories
	Edit content using basic video tools (CapCut preferred)
	Design and curate visually appealing content aligned with brand identity.


SEO&amp; Copywriting:


	Write compelling captions that capture attention
	Adapt messaging to suit different brand voices and audiences
	Ensure consistency in tone across platforms.


Platform Management:


	Manage TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter accounts
	Plan and maintain content calendars and posting schedules
	Stay up-to-date on trends and integrate them into campaigns
	Engage with followers and manage online community interactions.


Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience managing social media for dynamic brands
	Strong writing, editing, and creative skills
	Tech-savvy and trend-aware
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively
	Smart, punctual, hardworking, and highly organized
	Good command of English and professional presentation
	Good fashion sense is a plus.

Social Media Manager Job at Blaque Swann Brand




        
    

        
        Blaque Swann Legal Practitioners is a dynamic law firm committed to delivering practical,innovative, and client-focused legal solutions. With a strong emphasis on integrity,professionalism, and excellence, the firm provides legal advisory and representation across diverse practice areas including corporate and commercial law, dispute resolution, real estate,intellectual property, regulatory compliance, and personal legal services.

Blaque Swann Pop Up (BSPU) is a contemporary fashion and lifestyle brand that celebrates creativity, style, and individuality. Established as a fashion store and experiential retail showroom, BSPU curates a unique blend of clothing, accessories, and statement pieces that reflect modern trends while staying true to timeless elegance.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Content Creation & Editing:


	Create engaging short-form videos, reels, and stories
	Edit content using basic video tools (CapCut preferred)
	Design and curate visually appealing content aligned with brand identity.


SEO& Copywriting:


	Write compelling captions that capture attention
	Adapt messaging to suit different brand voices and audiences
	Ensure consistency in tone across platforms.


Platform Management:


	Manage TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter accounts
	Plan and maintain content calendars and posting schedules
	Stay up-to-date on trends and integrate them into campaigns
	Engage with followers and manage online community interactions.


Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience managing social media for dynamic brands
	Strong writing, editing, and creative skills
	Tech-savvy and trend-aware
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively
	Smart, punctual, hardworking, and highly organized
	Good command of English and professional presentation
	Good fashion sense is a plus.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
